titles.title: A resolution designating October 30, 2021, as a national day of remembrance for the workers of the nuclear weapons program of the United States.
A resolution designating October 30, 2021, as a national day of remembrance for the workers of the nuclear weapons program of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution designates October 30, 2021, as a national day of remembrance for the workers of the nuclear weapons program, including uranium miners, millers, and haulers and on-site participants at atmospheric nuclear weapons tests.
